CustomField.description: Summary of recommendation details to give partners more context when accepting recommendations from a data table
CustomField.formula: RecommendationType__r.Name + IF( ISBLANK( Designation__c ), "", " | Designated to " + Designation__r.FirstName ) + IF( RecommendationTypeName__c == "External transfer in" || RecommendationTypeName__c == "Internal transfer" || RecommendationTypeName__c == "Withdrawal - lump sum" || RecommendationTypeName__c == "Withdrawal - regular", " | From " + SourceName__c, "" ) + IF( RecommendationTypeName__c != "Withdrawal - lump sum" && RecommendationTypeName__c != "Withdrawal - regular", " | " + IF( RecommendationTypeName__c == "External transfer in" || RecommendationTypeName__c == "Internal transfer", " To ", "") + DestinationName__c, "" ) + IF( ISBLANK( Amount__c ) || Amount__c == 0, "", " | Â£" + TEXT(Amount__c) ) + IF( ISBLANK( EarliestFulfilmentDate__c ), "", " | This can't start until " + TEXT(EarliestFulfilmentDate__c) ) + IF( ISBLANK( FulfilmentDeadline__c ), "", " | This must be done by " + TEXT(FulfilmentDeadline__c) )
CustomField.label: Recommendation Summary
